blogPost.excerpt: Signing bad contracts is the worst. TermScout uses NLP + human attorneys to analyze more than 600 data points in common SaaS agreements and rates them based on customer favorability. Less negotiating, less legal, less confusion. Stop signing bad contracts!
blogPost.body: Signing bad contracts is the worst. TermScout uses NLP + human attorneys to analyze more than 600 data points in common SaaS agreements and rates them based on customer favorability. Less negotiating, less legal, less confusion. Stop signing bad contracts!
blogPost.title: TermScout - Free reviews and ratings on top SaaS contracts
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 签坏合同是最糟糕的。TermScout利用NLP+人类律师分析常见SaaS协议中的600多个数据点，并根据客户好感度进行评分。减少谈判、减少法律、减少困惑。别再签烂合同了!
localize.tagline: 对顶级SaaS合同的免费审查和评级

localize.description: 籤壞合同是最糟糕的。TermScout利用NLP+人類律師分析常見SaaS協議中的600多個數據點，並根據客戶好感度進行評分。減少談判、減少法律、減少困惑。別再籤爛合同了!
localize.tagline: 對頂級SaaS合同的免費審查和評級

previous.excerpt: All your links and highlights on a public bookshelf, shareable with one link ✨ Seamless saving - one click to highlight 🧠 Collect knowledge from anywhere 📕 Instantly see what your friends are reading Internet navigation, done right
previous.title: Curius - Save links and highlights to a beautiful personal page

localize.description: 您的所有链接和亮点都在公共书架上，可通过一个链接共享 ✨ 无缝保存--一键突出显示 🧠 随时随地收集知识 📕 立即查看您的朋友正在阅读的内容 互联网导航，做得很正确。
localize.tagline: 将链接和亮点保存到一个漂亮的个人页面

localize.description: 您的所有鏈接和亮點都在公共書架上，可通過一個鏈接共享 ✨ 無縫保存--一鍵突出顯示 🧠 隨時隨地收集知識 📕 立即查看您的朋友正在閱讀的內容 互聯網導航，做得很正確。
localize.tagline: 將鏈接和亮點保存到一個漂亮的個人頁面

next.excerpt: Make your company Apple-friendly with LiveChat integrated with Apple Business Chat. Thanks to it, customers can contact you through Messages chat button integrated in multiple iOS apps like Apple Maps, Siri and more.
next.title: Apple Business Chat for LiveChat - Offer great customer experience on Apple devices

localize.description: 通过与 Apple Business Chat 集成的 LiveChat，让你的公司对苹果友好。有了它，客户可以通过集成在苹果地图、Siri等多个iOS应用中的信息聊天按钮与你联系。
localize.tagline: 在苹果设备上提供良好的客户体验

localize.description: 通過與 Apple Business Chat 集成的 LiveChat，讓你的公司對蘋果友好。有了它，客戶可以通過集成在蘋果地圖、Siri等多個iOS應用中的信息聊天按鈕與你聯繫。
localize.tagline: 在蘋果設備上提供良好的客戶體驗
